name: River Raid 2600
description:
River Raid 2600: Did You Miss Me ?
River Raid is a scrolling shooter video game designed at 1982.

***Bring back your childhood memories...!
***Experience your dads childhood games...!

The classic oldies that really never get old.
In River Raid 2600, we travel to the 80's and the cartridge games age. We bring you back to that childhood dream of playing an air force pilot, sent to big missions to defend their country.


*********** Features **************

**This is the exact remake of River Raid
** Unlimited game play and maps
** A new Fantasy mode
** Cool achievements
** 3 types of controls (Tilt, Retro, Directions)

Universal App:
River Raid Original is supported on iPhone 4, iPhone 4S, iPhone 5, iPhone 6, iPhone 6S , iPhone 6 and 6S Plus, all iPad models, 4th, 5th and 6th generation iPod Touch.
